name: I Can Fix It!
description:
A printable party game about problems and solutions, made for Global Game Jam 2020.

Inspired by games like Snake Oil and Cards Against Humanity, I Can Fix It! is a game about fixing unique problems with unique solutions. Each round, one player is the "judge", who flips over a problem card. The other players pick a solution card from their hand and give it to the judge. The judge flips over the solution cards and the player who played it will defend their choice. Then, the judge picks a winning solution.

Expansion packs coming soon!
